description:
Poshi Toky is a nice, pretty animal that lives in Japan. He likes to play with gems, jewels, diamonds, but especially with coloured Christmas balls. He uses his sturdy legs to touch and break the coloured balls, then shakes his long tail to finally remove them from the screen. He tries to remove as much balls as possible and he is smart enough to use special weapons to facilitate this task. Unfortunately, he needs to avoid to be overwhelmed by incoming balls and this is not so easy...

Do you want to help the Poshi Toky? He really needs your support... but beware, once you start playing you may never want to stop! Try it now it’s FREE!


Some features of the game:
* expressly and exclusively designed for the iPad with use of the finger touch & accelerometer (for shaking) features to control the game;
* two game modes: "Classic" (with levels) and "Survival" (continuous mode);
* three different difficulty levels;
* gameplay that rewards strategy as well as speed;
* special weapons and bonuses to help with the game;
* hall of fame for your best scores;
* playable for everybody and anybody!
* it's fun for all ages!


If you like puzzle game download it now... It will be surely the favourite game for your family to play at Christmas! …don't miss it!
